channel.title: Commands

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @RuneForge_RSPS RuneForge RSPS
item.description:
@RuneForge_RSPS wrote:

Move the whole command next to a command that you KNOW that mods can only use, such as mute.

Guide:

Cut the xteleto command.
Type cntrl + f in commands.java, search for “mute” (with the quotes)
Paste the command next to the mute command. Save and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

Here…

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome")) { try { String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName); c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @arcane1 arcane1
item.description:
@arcane1 wrote:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome")) {
			try {	
				String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10);
				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) {
							Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
							c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName);
							c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel);
							break;
						} 
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}			
		}

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“Saletana, post:2, topic:427047”][quote author=Joseph69 link=topic=529747.msg3866943#msg3866943 date=1325076655]
I have , Xteletome command , and xteleto command , and when i go look at them in commands.java i wanted to make them able for mods to , but mods cannot use them how can i make mods able to use those commands. This is what it says in commands.java for xteleto , and xteletome:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteletome”)) {
try {
String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName);
c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel);
break;

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteleto”)) {
String name = playerCommand.substring(8);
for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel);
[/quote]

after
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteleto”)) {
you have to add the player rights you need to use, in your case, it is mod+ (1+), so you have to add something like

&& c.PlayerRights <=1 }

What that added code looks like is different in most servers, just scroll through your commands, look in yell, mute or something like this, and copy the player rights code out and paste it… You get the idea.

Good luck![/quote] Please help ? i added it straight after ifplayercommand starts with , and i got 100 errors ? WTF can u just find a one already done and let me copy paste? Pleasee dudde thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

[quote=“Joseph69, post:1, topic:427047”]I have , Xteletome command , and xteleto command , and when i go look at them in commands.java i wanted to make them able for mods to , but mods cannot use them how can i make mods able to use those commands. This is what it says in commands.java for xteleto , and xteletome:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteletome”)) {
try {
String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName);
c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel);
break;

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteleto”)) {
String name = playerCommand.substring(8);
for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel);[/quote]

after
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteleto”)) {
you have to add the player rights you need to use, in your case, it is mod+ (1+), so you have to add something like

&& c.PlayerRights <=1 }

What that added code looks like is different in most servers, just scroll through your commands, look in yell, mute or something like this, and copy the player rights code out and paste it… You get the idea.

Good luck!

Read full topic

for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel);
